alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Thomas County through 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boston, or 7 miles east of Thomasville, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Newark, Patten, Pasco, Eason, Merrillville and Oaklawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
